name: Bomby Run - Level 6, Sunken Sea v1.0
name_original: Bomby Run - Level 6, Sunken Sea v1.0
description:
Play it on Pc or Mobil Phone!
(Browser Game)

German Description: In diesem Spiel befinden sie, der Spieler sich als Bomby im Meer wieder um seinen Freund zu finden. Bomby liebt Münzen, besonders die roten! In diesem Meer gibt es gefährliche Feinde, die du besiegen kannst, indem du eine Wirbel Attacke ausführst! Manche von ihnen halten 1-2 Treffer aus, manche nehmen überhaupt keinen Schaden. 

English Description: In this game you, the Player find yourself as Bomby in the Ocean to find his friend. Bomby loves coins, especially the red ones! In this Ocean there are dangerous enemies that you can defeat by doing a spin attack! Some of them take 1-2 hits, some take no damage at all. 

 Game made by Lord Zcoper 

------------------------------------------

Difficulty: Medium 😐

------------------------------------------

Update: v1.0  

-Game release! 

How to play:
------------------------------------------
Controls:  
Run Left:                 Arrow Left
Run Right:              Arrow Right
Jump:                        Arrow Up
2x Jump:                 Arrow Up 2x
Attack:                     Space
------------------------------------------ 
Score:
Become a better Score by collecting the coins!
Normal Coin: + 14
Red Coin:         +300
------------------------------------------
Tips and Tricks:
Regenerate by collecting heart items (Full Health)
Jump on Enemies to deafet them!
Watch ahead to avoid unwanted situations!
Play on the Mobil Phone!
Look for the Timer! If it's shut down to 0 you Die!
Refill your Oxygen!
------------------------------------------
Player 

Health:                  3 Hearts
Damage:               1 Heart
Speed:                    450
Jump strenght: 800

Shell 
Spits out a coin when using a spin attack

Air bubbles 
Refill your Oxygen

------------------------------------------
